mods.abstract: Three color card fragment (blue, red, and yellow on white) featuring a woodcut of a clown pointing and a carnival scene. The poster was probably printed and designed by the Triangle Poster Printing Company, which is partially written on the back of the fragment.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
